name: cs3219-project-ay2223s1-g50
description: This is a template repository for CS3219 project.

scripts.installAll: npm i && concurrently "npm --prefix ./user-service i" "npm --prefix ./question-service i" "npm --prefix ./frontend i" "yarn --cwd ./matching-service" "yarn --cwd ./collaboration-service" "yarn --cwd ./chat-service"
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm --prefix ./user-service run dev" "npm --prefix ./question-service run dev" "yarn --cwd ./matching-service dev" "yarn --cwd ./collaboration-service dev" "yarn --cwd ./chat-service dev" "npm --prefix ./frontend run dev"
